original_text: For, lo, our fathers have fallen by the sword, and our sons and our daughters and our wives are in captivity for this.
korean_text: 이로 말미암아 우리의 조상들이 칼에 엎드러지며 우리의 자녀와 아내들이 사로잡혔느니라

sentences.original_text: our fathers have fallen by the sword
and our sons and our daughters and our wives
